patthana23.37:1.1: Naajjhattaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā bahiddhā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nabahiddhā nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhatto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana23.37:2.1: Naajjhattaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā bahiddhā akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nabahiddhā naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhatto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana23.37:3.1: Naajjhattaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nabahiddhā naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
